summary: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

Salinas|Manuel O. Velazquez|Thomas R. Nunan III|John Galindez|Lindsey Sutton|Alan J. Trudeau|Rafael Lopez Diaz|Norman Grant|Krissy Korn|Rose Davidson|Ramiro 'Ramir' Delgado Ruiz|Murisa Harba|Mariselle Morales|Jadah Lynn Platt|Isaac Santiago|Chasity Shaw|Carla Tricoli
title: Los perdedores
